message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this unique product for $2000000. It's a great opportunity to acquire something truly valuable.  Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1800000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $1900000, but that's my final offer.  It's a fair price considering the product's value. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1750000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I'm happy to continue negotiating with you, but $1750000 is simply too low. I'm willing to go down to $1850000.  This is a significant compromise on my part. Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a price of $1800000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise between our positions.
